text.section: There is a Board of Directors to administer the Association.

section.section: The Board of Directors consists of nine members elected by Association members.
The term of a member of the Board of Directors is 1 year.

If a group listed in paragraph (2)(i) or (ii) of this subsection fails to submit the name of a nominee at least 10 days before the election, the requirement that two directors be from among nominees of that group need not be met for that year.
